name: UNTimeIntervalNotificationTrigger
desc: A trigger condition that causes the system to deliver a notification after the amount of time you specify elapses.

items.name: init(timeInterval: TimeInterval, repeats: Bool)
items.desc: Creates a time interval trigger using the time value parameter.

items.name: func nextTriggerDate() -> Date?
items.desc: The next date at which the trigger conditions are met.

items.name: var timeInterval: TimeInterval
items.desc: The time interval to create the trigger.
